hero.title: Free-Range Eggs
hero.subtitle: Fresh & Natural
hero.description: From our farm in Divinópolis-MG straight to your table. Free-range chickens, natural feeding and eggs with incomparable flavor.

why.title: Why Choose Golden Eggs?
why.description: Our commitment is to offer superior quality eggs, produced with care and respect for animal welfare.

welfare.title: Animal Welfare
welfare.description: Free-range chickens in natural environment, with care and respect.

quality.title: Guaranteed Quality
quality.description: Fresh eggs collected daily with rigorous quality control.

delivery.title: Fast Delivery
delivery.description: From nest to your table in up to 48 hours, always fresh.

taste.title: Superior Taste
taste.description: Free-range eggs with distinctive flavor and higher nutritional value.

process.title: Our Process of Care and
process.subtitle: Quality
process.description: Each step of our process is designed to ensure chicken welfare and superior quality of eggs that reach your table.

feeding.title: Natural Feeding
feeding.description: Balanced feed specific for laying hens, without hormones or antibiotics.

environment.title: Free Environment
environment.description: Free-range chickens with access to outdoor areas and grazing.

collection.title: Daily Collection
collection.description: Eggs collected 3 times a day to ensure maximum freshness.

selection.title: Rigorous Selection
selection.description: Each egg is inspected to ensure quality and integrity.

breeds.title: Our Special Breeds
breeds.description: We work with two selected breeds, each with unique characteristics that guarantee exceptional quality eggs.

services.title: Our Areas of Operation
services.description: We are a complete company in the poultry sector, offering integrated solutions for small and medium producers.

egg_production.title: Free-Range Egg Production
egg_production.description: Fresh and high-quality eggs from free-range chickens with natural feeding.

chicken_sales.title: Chicken Sales
chicken_sales.description: Healthy birds at the end of production cycle, ideal for small farms.

bedding.title: Poultry Bedding
bedding.description: Organic fertilizer rich in nutrients to enrich your plantation soil.

location.title: Visit Our Farm in
location.subtitle: Divinópolis
location.description: Located in the rural area of Divinópolis-MG, our farm is always open for visits. Come see our process and see up close how we care for our chickens.

cta.title: Ready to try real eggs?
cta.description: Choose your plan and receive fresh and natural eggs directly from our farm to your home.

broodstock.description: Quality genetics for own consumption and for other partner producers.

franchise.title: Golden Eggs Franchises
franchise.description: Golden Eggs Farm franchises for small and medium producers.

education.description: Courses and training to professionalize and train new poultry farmers.

hero.title: Our Breeds
hero.description: Meet the two special breeds we raise on our farm, each with unique characteristics that guarantee exceptional quality eggs.

isaBrown.title: ISA Brown
isaBrown.description: The ISA Brown is one of the most popular and productive breeds in the world. Known for its robustness, adaptability and excellent brown egg production.

novagenTinted.title: Novagen Tinted
novagenTinted.description: The Novagen Tinted is a special breed that produces cream-shelled eggs, offering a differentiated product with superior flavor and quality.

comparison.title: Breed Comparison
comparison.description: Compare the main characteristics of the two breeds we raise on our farm.

cta.title: Interested in our breeds?
cta.description: Contact us to learn more about our chickens and how to acquire them.

hero.title: Subscription Plans
hero.description: Choose the ideal plan for your family and receive fresh and natural eggs monthly.

basic.name: Basic
basic.description: Ideal for couples or small families

premium.name: Premium
premium.description: For large families or intensive consumption

delivery.title: Guaranteed Delivery
delivery.description: Fresh eggs delivered to your door

location.title: Our Location
location.description: Visit our farm and see our production process up close.

hero.title: About Golden Eggs
hero.description: Learn about our history, mission and values that make us a reference in free-range egg production.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: Golden Eggs was born from the dream of offering superior quality eggs, produced with respect for animal welfare and the environment.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: To produce high-quality free-range eggs, promoting animal welfare and offering healthy and natural products.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To be a national reference in sustainable free-range egg production, expanding our reach and positive impact.

footer.description: Fresh and natural free-range eggs straight from our farm to your table.
